articles.description: Richmond football boss Neil Balme insists the Tigers are working hard with the AFL to ensure that Marlion Pickett's financial struggles are resolved promptly.
articles.content: I do feel for them [the AFL] a little bit too because everyones got a great idea to spend money outside of the TPP [total player payments] and a lot of them they do have to knock back a lot. Theyve b… [+2048 chars]
